channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: La puissance et l’élégance du MacBook Air M4 perdent 200 euros chez Amazon
item.description: Le MacBook Air M4 ne marque pas une révolution chez Apple et vient se placer dans la continuité de la version sous M3. Chez Amazon, il perd 16 % de son prix et chute à 1 139 euros.

item.title: 10 Best Drones (2025): Flight-Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Whether you want to battle Star Wars spaceships or shoot a cinematic masterpiece, one of these drones is going to be perfect for you.

item.title: PlayStation’s 2026 is likely to be more of the same, and that’s no bad thing
item.description: The year ahead for Sony looks promising, but will the publisher continue to lean on live-service titles? We predict what 2026 might have in store for PS5 and PlayStation.

item.title: Battle of the Sexes Free Streams: TV Channels, Start Time & Preview for Sabalenka vs Kyrgios
item.description: Watch Battle of the Sexes 2025 tennis as Aryna Sabalenka faces Nick Kyrgios at Coca-Cola Arena in Dubai – schedule, TV channels, broadcasters and free streams.

item.title: I've been a Spotify subscriber for over 10 years, but I'm ditching it for Apple Music in 2026 – here's why
item.description: Apple Music works across multiple platforms and the web, and it lets you build smart playlists – and that's why I'm quitting Spotify in 2026.

item.title: From Nano Banana’s rise to agentic AI misfires — here’s what defined 2025 in AI
item.description: Here’s the full AI story from 2025, a year in which AI has had more than its fair share of ups and downs.

item.title: 8 Best Plant-Based Meal Delivery Services and Kits (2025), Tested, Tasted, and Reviewed
item.description: Convenience isn’t just for meat eaters anymore. These plant-based meal kits and delivery services bring healthy preprepared meals and meal kits to your door.

item.title: People Who Drink Bottled Water on a Daily Basis Ingest 90,000 More Microplastic Particles Each Year
item.description: Drinking water in plastic bottles contains countless particles too small to see. New research finds that people who drink water from them on a daily basis ingest far more microplastics than those who don’t.

item.title: Billion-Dollar Data Centers Are Taking Over the World
item.description: The battle for AI dominance has left a large footprint—and it’s only getting bigger and more expensive.

item.title: My year in smartphones – 2025 was the year of the AI phone
item.description: New-ish looks, better cameras, and a whole lot of AI marked my 2025 smartphone journey.

item.title: Forget Audible and Amazon – I'm switching to these 5 alternatives for audiobooks and e-books in 2026
item.description: Amazon and Audible aren't the only places to get the best e-books and audiobooks –in fact, these 5 alternatives will make you feel much warmer inside.

item.title: Spotify piraté, bug assumé par Google et Xiaomi 17 Ultra – L’actu tech de la semaine
item.description: Cette semaine a été marquée par le piratage de Spotify, une mise à jour controversée des Pixel et plusieurs annonces Xiaomi en Chine parmi lesquels le Xiaomi 17 Ultra.
